abstract: UJA-Federation of New York, one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, gives $4,253 to Rosanna Matos to pay her bills after her son Robert contracted serious bacterial infection.
lead_paragraph: What Robert Matos and his mother, Rosanna, thought was a routine softball strain turned out to be a serious bacterial infection, which a sister of Robert’s also developed.

headline.main: A Pitch, a Swing and a Family’s Medical Nightmare
headline.print_headline: A Pitch, a Swing and a Family’s Medical Nightmare

snippet: What Robert Matos and his mother, Rosanna, thought was a routine softball strain turned out to be a serious bacterial infection, which a sister of Robert’s also developed.
